definition: to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to possess/to have/equipped with/able to fulfill (conditions or requirements)
prepared against war/to prepare for war/warmongering
faultless/complete/perfect/to leave nothing to be desired

sentences.english: The factors were studied which affected the preparation of PFS in this method.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氯酸鈉氧化法制備PFS的影響因素。

sentences.english: The Hippiphae Rimniodesc(HR) mixture microcapsule was manufactured through suspensoid cross-link method.
sentences.chinese: 採用懸浮交聯法制備沙棘混合粉的微膠囊。

sentences.english: In this paper, asymmetric microporous poly (vinylidene fluoride) (PVDF)membranes were prepared by phase-inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用相轉換法制備了聚偏氟乙烯不對稱微孔膜。

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制備丙烯酸酯合成樹脂。

sentences.english: Meso - carbon microbeads (MCMBs) were prepared from coal tar pitch by condensation.
sentences.chinese: 以煤瀝青爲原料，採用熱縮聚法制備中間相炭微球。

sentences.english: Buttermilk is added to soups and certain cheeses ;
sentences.chinese: 白脫牛奶備添加在湯或乾酪裏面。

sentences.english: Mechanism of carbon reducing reaction in preparing strontium carbonate by carbon reducing method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了碳還原法制備碳酸鍶過程中碳還原反應的機理。

sentences.english: The title alkyd resin modified waterborne nitrocellulose emulsion was prepared by alkyd resin phase inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 採用醇酸樹脂相反轉乳化法制備了硝化纖維素乳液。

sentences.english: Surface morphologies of coatings prepared by SPPS presented obvious layer structure.
sentences.chinese: SPPS法制備的塗層表面形貌呈現明顯的層狀結構。

sentences.english: Porous alumina was prepared by anodization in oxalic acid electrolyte.
sentences.chinese: 在草酸電解液中，用陽極氧化法制備了多孔氧化鋁。

sentences.english: METHODS The garlic oil submicron emulsion was obtained after passing the elementary emulsion through a high pressure homogenizer.
sentences.chinese: 方法採用高壓勻質法制備大蒜油亞微乳。

sentences.english: The effects of annealing on superconducting transition and the thermostability of MgB.
sentences.chinese: 超導體制備過程中的退火效應和熱穩定性的實驗研究。

sentences.english: The experimental studies on iron carbide formation by two step method have been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗室條件下進行了二步法制備碳化鐵的研究。

sentences.english: CeO_2 nano-powders were synthesized by a carbon absorption and combustion method.
sentences.chinese: 採用碳吸附燃燒法制備氧化鈰納米粉體。

sentences.english: This article reviewed the new technique of antibody preparation from genetic engineering.
sentences.chinese: 本文就基因工程抗體制備的新技術簡要綜述。

sentences.english: The feasibility of prepared nanometer-scale copper powders by chemical reduction method was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探索用化學還原法制備納米銅粉的可行性。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
line of business/industry/occupation/job/employment/school studies/enterprise/property/(Buddhism) karma/deed/to engage in/already
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
